title: "Focus on “Big Science”, the collaborative project for the development of an efficient open source language model"
excerpt: "In order to develop an efficient open source multilingual language model in one year, several laboratories, large groups and start-ups have come together. They will use the French supercomputer Jean Zay to carry out the “Big Science”project."
